name: Deezer dark comfort
description: A dark theme for Deezer which focuses on being easy on the eyes and having contrast between different interface parts, while being fully dark and beautiful. Please follow the development on GitHub.
additional_info:
Release 0.1.0 : Add to playlist, account popover, and sidebar fixed.
Release 0.2.0 : Lyrics screen fixed, so you can sing 'til the end of the night
Release 0.3.0 : Style is now WAY smaller due to some technical changes.
Thank you for the 100 installs. Even though Deezer are rolling their own dark theme, I will keep updating this one since I found Deezer's theme too dark.
